mapper.select: SELECT created_at, temperature, humidity, co2, ammonia, pm, #{farm_idx} as farm_idx FROM farm_env_info WHERE farm_idx = #{farm_idx} AND created_at >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(MAX(created_at), INTERVAL 28 DAY) FROM farm_env_info WHERE farm_idx = #{farm_idx}) ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 28;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO farm_info (farm_name, farm_loc, farm_livestock_cnt, mem_id) VALUES (#{farm_name}, #{farm_loc}, #{farm_livestock_cnt}, #{mem_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pen_info WHERE farm_idx IN ( SELECT farm_idx FROM farm_info WHERE farm_name = #{farm_name})
